body: Listen, even I, a person who claims to be strong when it comes to Hentai and weird shit, I pallor when I see the word "Hentai" and the artist "Hayao Miyasaki" together. Not because I'm not strong, but because I deeply love Hayao Miyasaki's works, and I will never watch porn that came out of his masterpieces, even less by the fact this doujinshi has "scat" marked. I'm sorry, but I'll pass on this loli stuff, even though it's one of my favourite tags in this site, I deeply dislike H.M's art transformed into simple, banal forms of porn, which are the tags marked here...
